body_html:
@case540 thanks for the help! is there also something you can add (to the sanity bot maybe?) to flag if a PR accidentally commits the "import %workspace%/.bazelrc" line until we get the try-import stuff?
Otherwise it shouldn't be too long before 0.18.0 is out so we can just keep an eye on it carefully.
body_text:
@case540 thanks for the help! is there also something you can add (to the sanity bot maybe?) to flag if a PR accidentally commits the "import %workspace%/.bazelrc" line until we get the try-import stuff?
Otherwise it shouldn't be too long before 0.18.0 is out so we can just keep an eye on it carefully.
body:
@case540 thanks for the help! is there also something you can add (to the sanity bot maybe?) to flag if a PR accidentally commits the "import %workspace%/.bazelrc" line until we get the try-import stuff?
Otherwise it shouldn't be too long before 0.18.0 is out so we can just keep an eye on it carefully.
